sentence.Network_en: Le Whif is a new approach to eating, by breathing.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸入式巧克力是依靠呼吸来享受美食的一个新尝试.

list.abs: The gust of air whiffed away the clouds ., 一阵狂风吹散了乌云.

auth_sentence.content: If obesity is an addiction, then Le Whif is its nicotine inhaler.
